text: [Wo] xiang sa mu de ren paiqianle tamen de xiongdi sa li ha. Ta [sa li ha] shuo:“Wo de zuren a! Nimen dang chongbai an la, chu ta wai, nimen zai meiyou ying shou chongbai de zhu. Ta you dadi chuangzaole nimen, bing shi nimen juzhu qizhong, suoyi, nimen dang qiu ta kuanshu, ranhou, nimen dang xiang ta huizui [zhu][bing gui xin ta]. Wo de zhu que shi linjin de, youqiubiying de.”
